com.ibm.jaggr.core.cache

Interface IGenericCache

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IGzipCache, ILayerCache, IModuleCache, IResourceConverterCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericCacheImpl, GzipCacheImpl, LayerCacheImpl, ModuleCacheImpl, ResourceConverterCacheImpl

    public interface IGenericCache

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Remove all entries in the cache
      boolean contains(String key)
      Returns true if the entry with the specified key is in the cache
      void dump(Writer writer, Pattern filter)
      Output the cache info to the specified Writer
      Set<String> getKeys()
      Returns the set of keys associated with entries in the cache
      IGenericCache newInstance()
      Returns a new, empty, instance of this cache object.
      void setAggregator(IAggregator aggregator)
      Called for newly created (or de-serialized) caches to set the aggregator instance for this cache.
      int size()
      Returns the number of entries in the layer cache

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        boolean contains(String key)
        Returns true if the entry with the specified key is in the cache
        Parameters:
        key - the entry key
        Returns:
        true if the specified entry is in the cache

      • clear

        void clear()
        Remove all entries in the cache

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of entries in the layer cache
        Returns:
        the number of entries

      • getKeys

        Set<String> getKeys()
        Returns the set of keys associated with entries in the cache
        Returns:
        the key set

      • dump

        void dump(Writer writer,
        Pattern filter)
          throws IOException
        Output the cache info to the specified Writer
        Parameters:
        writer - the target Writer
        filter - Optional filter argument
        Throws:
        IOException

      • setAggregator

        void setAggregator(IAggregator aggregator)
        Called for newly created (or de-serialized) caches to set the aggregator instance for this cache. Note that the aggregator may not be fully initialized at the time that this method is called and some aggregator methods (like IAggregator.getConfig() may return null if called from within this method.
        Parameters:
        aggregator - The aggregator instance for the cache

      • newInstance

        IGenericCache newInstance()
        Returns a new, empty, instance of this cache object. Used by the cache manager when clearing the aggregator cache.
        Returns:
        a new instance of this cache object
